name: ArachnoMadness
description:
AraknoMadnes! A group of flies fell down in your huge web. Face them to recover your home! Walk around the web to pick up powers and abilities. BUGs Known 1 - If the game canvas shifts to the side, use itch.io's fullscreen button. The game does not stretch, but you can play it. 2 - Once the final boss is defeated, the win screen does not pop up. To end the run: Pause>EndRun>Exit Game Controls WASD: Movement Arrow Keys: Shooting Shift: Open/Close minimap Q: Ability 1 E: Ability 2 Esc: Pause Roguelike jam 2 This is a game developed for Roguelike jam 2. Enjoy! Thanks for playing and, please, leave your feedback in a comment! Development team This game was developed by:
  • Imanol Díaz Servando
    • Itch.io: https://zeus-guy.itch.io/
  • Pablo López Pérez-Esparza:
